item.title: Conformal Prediction
item.description: Conformal prediction is a method to predict a consistent confidence interval in an on-line setting. The algorithms is following the [[Neyman-Pearson hypothesis testing]] Neyman-Pearson Theory The Neyman-Pearson hypothesis testing tests two hypothesis, hypothesis $H$, and an alternative hypothesis $H_A$. Neyman-Pearson Lemma The Neyman-Pearson Lemma is an very intuitive lemma to understand how to choose a hypothesis. The lecture notes from PennState is a very good read on this topic1.
